text: Halil İbrahim Özsoy (1938 – 14 August 2018) is a Turkish politician. He served as the Minister of Health between 1997 and 1999. He graduated from Ege University's Faculty of Medicine. He was a specialist in mental and neurological sciences. He was the Chief Medical Officer of Afyon State Hospital. Özsoy served as deputy from Afyon in the 19th, 20th and 21st parliamentary periods. He was married and had three children. He was the Chairman of the Motherland Party. He struggled with cancer for 3 years before he died. == References == Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Motherland Party (Turkey) politicians Category:Ege University alumni Category:Health ministers of Turkey Category:Members of the 19th Parliament of Turkey Category:Members of the 20th Parliament of Turkey Category:Members of the 21st Parliament of Turkey Category:Members of the 55th government of Turkey
title: Halil İbrahim Özsoy
